mutants.mutated_line: groups = 1
mutants.code:
def min_anagram_groups(names):
    groups = 1
    while names:
        temp_name = names.pop(0)
        temp = [temp_name]
        matches = [name for name in names if temp_name[0] == name[0] and temp_name[-1] == name[-1]]
        for match in matches:
            temp.append(match)
            names.remove(match)
        sort_temp = [''.join(sorted(name)) for name in temp]
        groups += len(set(sort_temp))
    return groups
